Blog

What's nu? Frequency

Minor Site Updates

Posted by Thomas on 30 September 2012

The Scoot’s Canoe Tech Committee continued to roll out minor improvements to the website through the last week of September. In addition to the Teamspeak status checking mentioned in this blog post, we have also introduced similar status checking (through some very slick JSONP APIs provided by flask.gilgi.org) for the CS:S server and for the Ventrilo sever, which, although seldom used by Scoot’s Canoe members, now has its own page under Servers. Of course, the statuses for all these servers and everything else on the network can also be checked live at status.gilgi.org.

In the near future, the Tech Committee plans to finally do something about the lack of a real About page. Stay tuned for more updates, and feel free to contact us with any suggestions, comments, complaints, or bug reports.
